title: School assignment
body:
I'm doing a school English assignment on "is Evelynn's rework to over sexualized" {{champion:28}}  if i could get a rioters opinions on this it would be a great help and boost my mark up a bit.

thanks for your cooperation.

Edit: there are many sexualised female champs in the game such as ahri and miss fortune any many non sexualised champs such as jinx and Annie but the voice lines in Eve's gameplay are a bit much for the younger audience.

replies.body: School project on a league issue ......................... your teachers gonna have no idea what you're talking about just write bs
nah my english teach was an ex dota player and he dabbles in the league of legends.

Quick question what do you mean by overexercised? Like over done or too much of a change? 

As for getting a rioter to see it. You might also want to look at the support page I think there's a general enquires options you might be able to look into. There's no garuntee a rioter will see this post.

sorry it was a typo on my behalf it was men't to be oversexualized but auto correct got to me, but i mean that they have a lot of sexualised champs such as miss fortune and ahri but they have never gone this far with the voice lines and i get that it is all apart of her lore and she is a succubus but really i couldn't think of anything to do my assignment on so this is a good topic.

> [{quoted}](name=Mozzie25,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=y14iVFcE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-19T05:02:55.584+0000)
>
> Quick question what do you mean by overexercised? Like over done or too much of a change? 

Mozzie's right. It would be great to get some insight into what your assignment plans to cover. It's fairly vague at the moment. But I'm sure the community would be willing offer their input into any questions you have.
